PageWidgetPortable.Title: Condições para regras
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_GN_REGRAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.TIPO = 'P' AND A.GRUPO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM GN_GRUPOREGRAS WHERE MODULO = 2 AND PROCESSO = 3)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3486_at5823_hsdb4d8085.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
